channel.title: Boss Hunting Team for double loots
channel.description:
Hey guys, if you've not seen on the Runescape website Jagex are giving us a smexi weekend. Double loots on certain bosses(refer to http://services.runescape.com/m=news/wild-weekends-double-drops-and-monkey-mayhem). Time to cash on this me thinks, the point of this thread is to arrange teams for certain/multiple bosses. I will host the event unless someone else who is responsible wishes to host it(decided by people who will be attending). Please post your stats so we can think about what bosses are more suitable for your level, if your like a level 90 and want to go Nex sorry but thats not realistic. If your going to a certain boss unless its a mass event be [u]expected[/u] to contribute.
[size=24pt][b]Friends chat[/b] : Fringiee
My own stats : [IMG]http://img689.imageshack.us/img689/369/99076644.png[/img][/URL] We will coinshare however we may be doing some ffa but splitting the drops if we cannot find a ls world thats free.

item.title: Boss Hunting Team for double loots
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

(N)eon:

Any drops?

Not really, done bandos and arma so far. Nothing from bandos had to leave cause kept getting crashed(accs still at bandos o.0) and 3 shards at arma D:.

Read full topic

Tutorial:

Was an example, was thinking about a range of bosses so everyone can participate or make sub teams if you get my meaning. I can’t do Nex myself(never tried and not going to cause of my def and its expensive for attempts;o).
